ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Prepare for another nerf.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... actually the biggest benefit of the mask is for the large races who can switch to a medium size race in tight dungeons without having to get a shrink.
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:26 AM 9/19/00 -0400, you wrote:
> >
>
>
>The Mask, on the other hand, does nothing more than change the appearance of
>the bearer and grant ultravision - hardly a balance-altering situation. I
>think by the time they could get the mask, their faction with the
>IndigoBrothers (or whatever the Inkie faction is) would be so screwed that
>any faction benefits gained from taking Inkie form would be negated.

actually the biggest benefit of the mask is for the large races who can switch to
a medium size race in tight dungeons without having to get a shrink. this is actually
quite a big deal.
